Categories!

May 9, 2002

I’ve added a feature to the web page version of the blog whereby you can select to view only items in a particular category. Current categories are: “Afghanistan,” “Globalization,” “Human Rights,” and “Middle East,” with everything else marked as the general category “News.” But please note that these categories only apply to items posted after May 7th, as I will not have the time to go back and assign categories to older items. There is also a general search feature on the web page which you can use to look up older items, but hopefully the categories will be easier to use. (I didn’t really do anything, this was simply a new feature added when I upgraded the software that runs the site.)
